main event: On August 6, 1956 at 0050 hours in Oklahoma, a ground-visual observation reported a bright yellow light moving slowly at a constant speed before disappearing suddenly.
interesting points: The duration of the observation was only 10 seconds.
A similar sighting was reported earlier in 1952 in a different location.
The conclusion of the observation was that it was probably a balloon or an aircraft.
Another sighting in a different location described a translucent, yellow, cigar-shaped object with a rounded tail.
The report includes measurements and observations related to the reported UFO sighting.
sighted object: One bright yellow light in the sky
